name: Send MFA Step-Up Auth Email OTP by Access Token
description: This API is created to send the OTP to the email if email OTP authenticator is enabled in app's MFA configuration.

Get Params.name: Email_ID
Get Params.description: OTP will be send to this emailId. It should be part of profile.

Get Params.name: EmailTemplate2F
Get Params.description: Name of the customized email template
